   182→    const formatDate = (dateStr: string) => {
   183→        return new Date(dateStr).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' });
   184→    };
   185→
   186→    const formatDateShort = (dateStr: string) => {
   187→        return new Date(dateStr).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: '2-digit', day: '2-digit', year: '2-digit' }).replace(/\//g, '.');
   188→    };
   189→
   190→    const scrollToTop = () => window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
   191→
   192→    const scrollToHeading = (id: string) => {
   193→        const element = document.getElementById(id);
   194→        if (element) {
   195→            window.scrollTo({ top: element.getBoundingClientRect().top + window.scrollY - 100, behavior: 'smooth' });
   196→        }
   197→    };
   198→
   199→    const copyCode = async (code: string) => {
   200→        try {
   201→            await navigator.clipboard.writeText(code);
   202→            setCopiedCode(code);
   203→            setTimeout(() => setCopiedCode(null), TOAST_DURATION.copy);
   204→        } catch (err) {
   205→            console.error('Failed to copy code:', err);
   206→        }
   207→    };
   208→
   209→    const copyEmail = async () => {
   210→        try {
   211→            await navigator.clipboard.writeText(profile.email);
   212→            setEmailCopied(true);
   213→            setTimeout(() => setEmailCopied(false), TOAST_DURATION.copy);
   214→        } catch (err) {
   215→            console.error('Failed to copy email:', err);
   216→        }
   217→    };
   218→
   219→    const getPostUrl = () => `${window.location.origin}/blog/${post.slug}`;
   220→
   221→    const shareOnTwitter = () => {
   222→        window.open(`https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=${encodeURIComponent(`${post.title} by @kolob0kk`)}&url=${encodeURIComponent(getPostUrl())}`, '_blank', `width=${SHARE_WINDOW.width},height=${SHARE_WINDOW.height}`);
   223→    };
   224→
   225→    const shareOnLinkedIn = () => {
   226→        window.open(`https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=${encodeURIComponent(getPostUrl())}`, '_blank', `width=${SHARE_WINDOW.width},height=${SHARE_WINDOW.height}`);
   227→    };
   228→
   229→    const copyLink = async () => {
   230→        try {
   231→            await navigator.clipboard.writeText(getPostUrl());
   232→            setShowCopyToast(true);
   233→            setTimeout(() => setShowCopyToast(false), TOAST_DURATION.copy);
   234→        } catch (err) {
   235→            console.error('Failed to copy link:', err);
   236→        }
   237→    };
   238→
   239→    const handleLike = () => {
   240→        if (hasLiked) {
   241→            const result = unlikePost(post.slug);
   242→            if (result.success) { setLikeCount(result.count); setHasLiked(false); }
   243→        } else {
   244→            const result = likePost(post.slug);
   245→            if (result.success) {
   246→                setLikeCount(result.count);
   247→                setHasLiked(true);
   248→                setIsLiking(true);
   249→                setTimeout(() => setIsLiking(false), ANIMATION_DURATION.likeButton);
   250→            }
   251→        }
   252→    };
   253→
   254→    const relatedPosts = posts
   255→        .filter(p => p.slug !== post.slug && p.tags.some(tag => post.tags.includes(tag)))
   256→        .slice(0, 2);
   257→
   258→    return (
   259→        <div style={{ minHeight: '100vh', background: 'var(--color-background)', color: 'var(--color-text-primary)' }}>
   260→            <style>{`
   261→                /* Reading Progress */
   262→                .progress-bar { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; height: 3px; background: var(--color-border-light); z-index: 1001; }
   263→                .progress-fill { height: 100%; background: var(--color-accent); transition: width 0.1s ease-out; }
   264→
   265→                /* Nav */
   266→                .blog-nav { position: sticky; top: 0; background: var(--color-nav-bg); backdrop-filter: blur(12px); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px); border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); z-index: 100; }
   267→                .back-link { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; color: var(--color-text-tertiary); text-decoration: none; transition: color var(--transition-fast); font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   268→                .back-link:hover { color: var(--color-accent); }
   269→                .back-link span { transition: transform var(--transition-fast); }
   270→                .back-link:hover span { transform: translateX(-4px); }
   271→
   272→                /* Tags */
   273→                .tag { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; padding: 4px 10px; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 0.05em; text-transform: uppercase; border-radius: 0; font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   274→                .tag-primary { background: var(--color-tag-hover); color: var(--color-accent); border: 1px solid var(--color-cert-border); }
   275→                .tag-secondary { background: var(--color-background-secondary); color: var(--color-text-muted); border: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); }
   276→
   277→                /* Author row */
   278→                .author-row { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; border-top: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); padding: 20px 0; margin-top: 32px; }
   279→                .author-info { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 16px; }
   280→                .author-avatar { width: 48px; height: 48px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; filter: grayscale(1); border: 2px solid var(--color-photo-border); }
   281→                .author-name { font-size: 14px; font-weight: 600; color: var(--color-text-primary); font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   282→                .author-meta { font-size: 12px; color: var(--color-text-muted); font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   283→                .action-btn { width: 32px; height: 32px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; border-radius: 50%; background: var(--color-background-secondary); border: none; color: var(--color-text-muted); cursor: pointer; transition: all var(--transition-fast); }
   284→                .action-btn:hover { color: var(--color-accent); background: var(--color-tag-hover); }
   285→                .action-btn svg { width: 16px; height: 16px; }
   286→
   287→                /* Hero image */
   288→                .hero-figure { margin: 48px 0; }
   289→                .hero-image-wrapper { position: relative; aspect-ratio: 16/9; border-radius: 0; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow-drawer); background: var(--color-background-secondary); }
   290→                .hero-image { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; opacity: 0.85; }
   291→                .hero-gradient { position: absolute; inset: 0; background: linear-gradient(to top right, var(--color-overlay-dark), transparent); }
   292→                .hero-caption { margin-top: 16px; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; color: var(--color-text-muted); font-style: italic; font-family: var(--font-serif); }
   293→
   294→                /* Prose - using Instrument fonts */
   295→                .blog-prose h2 { font-size: clamp(22px, 4vw, 28px); font-family: var(--font-serif); font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; color: var(--color-text-primary); margin: 48px 0 20px; letter-spacing: -0.02em; line-height: 1.3; }
   296→                .blog-prose h3 { font-size: clamp(18px, 3vw, 22px); font-family: var(--font-serif); font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; color: var(--color-text-primary); margin: 40px 0 16px; line-height: 1.4; }
   297→                .blog-prose p { font-size: 17px; color: var(--color-text-secondary); line-height: 1.8; margin: 0 0 24px; font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   298→                .blog-prose ul, .blog-prose ol { margin: 0 0 24px; padding-left: 24px; color: var(--color-text-secondary); }
   299→                .blog-prose li { font-size: 17px; line-height: 1.8; margin-bottom: 12px; font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   300→                .blog-prose li strong { color: var(--color-text-primary); }
   301→                .blog-prose a { color: var(--color-accent); text-decoration: none; transition: opacity var(--transition-fast); }
   302→                .blog-prose a:hover { opacity: 0.8; }
   303→                .blog-prose strong { color: var(--color-text-primary); font-weight: 600; }
   304→                .blog-prose em { font-style: italic; }
   305→                .blog-prose hr { border: none; height: 1px; background: var(--color-border); margin: 48px 0; }
   306→                .blog-prose code:not([class*="language-"]) { background: var(--color-background-tertiary); padding: 2px 8px; font-size: 0.9em; color: var(--color-accent); border-radius: 0; }
   307→
   308→                /* Blockquote */
   309→                .blog-prose blockquote { border-left: 3px solid var(--color-accent); margin: 32px 0; padding: 16px 24px; background: var(--color-background-secondary); border-radius: 0; }
   310→                .blog-prose blockquote p { margin: 0; font-size: 18px; color: var(--color-text-secondary); line-height: 1.7; font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   311→
   312→                /* Code block with macOS chrome - using design system colors */
   313→                .code-block { margin: 32px 0; border-radius: 0; overflow: hidden; border: 1px solid var(--color-border); background: var(--color-code-bg); box-shadow: var(--shadow-drawer); }
   314→                .code-header { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; padding: 12px 16px; background: var(--color-background-tertiary); border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border); }
   315→                .code-dots { display: flex; gap: 6px; }
   316→                .code-dot { width: 10px; height: 10px; border-radius: 50%; }
   317→                .code-dot-red { background: var(--color-danger); }
   318→                .code-dot-yellow { background: #FFBD2E; }
   319→                .code-dot-green { background: var(--color-success); }
   320→                .code-filename { font-size: 12px; font-family: monospace; color: var(--color-text-tertiary); margin-left: 12px; }
   321→                .code-lang { font-size: 10px; font-weight: 600; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.05em; color: var(--color-text-muted); font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   322→                .code-copy-btn { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; background: transparent; border: none; color: var(--color-text-tertiary); font-size: 12px; cursor: pointer; padding: 4px 8px; border-radius: 0; transition: all var(--transition-fast); font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   323→                .code-copy-btn:hover { color: var(--color-text-primary); background: var(--color-border-light); }
   324→                .code-copy-btn svg { width: 14px; height: 14px; }
   325→                .code-content { padding: 20px; overflow-x: auto; }
   326→                .code-content pre { margin: 0 !important; background: transparent !important; }
   327→                .code-content code { background: transparent !important; }
   328→                .code-content span { background: transparent !important; }
   329→
   330→                /* Author bio card */
   331→                .author-card { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 20px; padding: 24px; background: var(--color-background-secondary); border: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); margin-top: 32px; margin-bottom: 48px; box-shadow: var(--shadow-card); transition: box-shadow var(--transition-fast); }
   332→                @media (min-width: 768px) { .author-card { flex-direction: row; align-items: flex-start; gap: 24px; padding: 28px; } }
   333→                .author-card-avatar { width: 64px; height: 64px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; filter: grayscale(1); flex-shrink: 0; }
   334→                .author-card-content { flex: 1; }
   335→                .author-card-title { font-family: var(--font-serif); font-style: italic; font-size: 18px; color: var(--color-text-primary); margin-bottom: 6px; }
   336→                .author-card-bio { font-size: 13px; color: var(--color-text-tertiary); line-height: 1.5; margin-bottom: 16px; font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   337→                .author-card-actions { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 4px; padding: 4px; background: var(--color-background); border: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); }
   338→                .author-card-btn { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 5px; padding: 6px 12px; background: transparent; border: none; color: var(--color-text-secondary); font-size: 11px; font-weight: 500; font-family: var(--font-sans); cursor: pointer; text-decoration: none; transition: all 0.2s ease; white-space: nowrap; }
   339→                .author-card-btn:hover { color: var(--color-text-primary); background: var(--color-tag-hover); }
   340→                .author-card-btn svg { width: 12px; height: 12px; opacity: 0.7; }
   341→                .author-card-btn-primary { background: var(--color-accent); color: var(--color-background); }
   342→                .author-card-btn-primary:hover { background: var(--color-accent-hover); color: var(--color-background); }
   343→                .author-card-btn-primary svg { opacity: 1; }
   344→                .author-card-divider { width: 1px; height: 14px; background: var(--color-border-light); }
   345→
   346→                /* Tags footer */
   347→                .tags-footer { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 8px; align-items: center; margin-top: 32px; padding-top: 24px; border-top: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); }
   348→                .tags-label { font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; color: var(--color-text-muted); margin-right: 8px; font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   349→                .tag-link { font-size: 14px; color: var(--color-text-tertiary); text-decoration: none; transition: color var(--transition-fast); font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   350→                .tag-link:hover { color: var(--color-accent); }
   351→
   352→                /* More thoughts section */
   353→                .more-thoughts { background: var(--color-background-secondary); border-top: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); padding: 80px 0; margin-top: 80px; }
   354→                .more-thoughts-title { font-family: var(--font-serif); font-style: italic; font-size: 24px; color: var(--color-text-primary); margin-bottom: 32px; }
   355→                .thought-card { display: block; padding: 24px; background: var(--color-background); border: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; transition: all var(--transition-fast); box-shadow: var(--shadow-card); }
   356→                .thought-card:hover { border-color: var(--color-accent); background: var(--color-card-hover); box-shadow: var(--shadow-card-hover); }
   357→                .thought-date { font-size: 12px; font-weight: 600; color: var(--color-text-muted); margin-bottom: 8px; font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   358→                .thought-title { font-family: var(--font-serif); font-style: italic; font-size: 20px; color: var(--color-text-primary); margin-bottom: 12px; transition: color var(--transition-fast); }
   359→                .thought-card:hover .thought-title { color: var(--color-accent); }
   360→                .thought-cta { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 4px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; color: var(--color-accent); font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   361→                .thought-cta svg { width: 16px; height: 16px; transition: transform var(--transition-fast); }
   362→                .thought-card:hover .thought-cta svg { transform: translateX(4px); }
   363→
   364→                /* TOC */
   365→                .toc-container { position: sticky; top: 100px; padding: 20px; background: transparent; border: none; border-radius: 0; }
   366→                .toc-title { font-size: 11px; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: 0.1em; text-transform: uppercase; color: var(--color-text-muted); margin-bottom: 16px; font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   367→                .toc-item { display: block; font-size: 13px; color: var(--color-text-tertiary); padding: 8px 0; cursor: pointer; transition: color var(--transition-fast); border-left: 2px solid var(--color-border-light); padding-left: 12px; font-family: var(--font-sans); background: transparent; border-top: none; border-right: none; border-bottom: none; text-align: left; width: 100%; }
   368→                .toc-item:hover { color: var(--color-text-primary); }
   369→                .toc-item.active { color: var(--color-accent); border-left-color: var(--color-accent); }
   370→                .toc-item.level-2 { padding-left: 20px; }
   371→                .toc-item.level-3 { padding-left: 28px; font-size: 12px; }
   372→
   373→                /* Utils */
   374→                .back-to-top { position: fixed; bottom: 24px; right: 24px; width: 48px; height: 48px; border-radius: 0; background: var(--color-background-secondary); border: 1px solid var(--color-border); color: var(--color-text-secondary); cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 20px; z-index: 100; opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); pointer-events: none; transition: all var(--transition-fast); font-family: var(--font-serif); }
   375→                .back-to-top.visible { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); pointer-events: auto; }
   376→                .back-to-top:hover { background: var(--color-accent); color: var(--color-background); border-color: var(--color-accent); }
   377→                .copy-toast { position: fixed; bottom: 90px; right: 24px; background: var(--color-background-secondary); border: 1px solid var(--color-accent); color: var(--color-text-primary); padding: 12px 20px; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 500; z-index: 1002; opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); transition: all var(--transition-fast); pointer-events: none; border-radius: 0; font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   378→                .copy-toast.visible { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
   379→
   380→                /* Like button */
   381→                .like-btn { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; background: none; border: none; color: var(--color-text-muted); cursor: pointer; padding: 8px; transition: all var(--transition-fast); font-family: var(--font-sans); }
   382→                .like-btn:hover, .like-btn.liked { color: var(--color-accent); }
   383→                .like-btn svg { width: 20px; height: 20px; }
   384→                .like-btn.animating svg { animation: likeBounce 0.6s var(--ease-smooth); }
   385→                @keyframes likeBounce { 0% { transform: scale(1); } 25% { transform: scale(1.3); } 50% { transform: scale(1.1); } 75% { transform: scale(1.25); } 100% { transform: scale(1); } }
   386→
   387→                /* Drop cap */
   388→                .blog-prose > p:first-of-type::first-letter { float: left; font-family: var(--font-serif); font-size: 3.5em; line-height: 0.8; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 4px; color: var(--color-text-primary); font-weight: 400; }
   389→
   390→                /* Reading time remaining */
   391→                .reading-indicator { position: fixed; top: 3px; right: 24px; font-size: 11px; color: var(--color-text-muted); font-family: var(--font-sans); z-index: 1002; opacity: 0; transition: opacity var(--transition-fast); }
   392→                .reading-indicator.visible { opacity: 1; }
   393→
   394→                /* Prev/Next navigation */
   395→                .post-nav { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 16px; margin-top: 48px; padding-top: 32px; border-top: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); }
   396→                @media (max-width: 640px) { .post-nav { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } }
   397→                .post-nav-link { display: flex; flex-direction: column; padding: 20px; background: var(--color-background-secondary); border: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); text-decoration: none; transition: all var(--transition-fast); }
   398→                .post-nav-link:hover { border-color: var(--color-accent); background: var(--color-card-hover); }
   399→                .post-nav-link.next { text-align: right; }
   400→                .post-nav-label { font-size: 11px; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: 0.1em; text-transform: uppercase; color: var(--color-text-muted); margin-bottom: 8px; font-family: var(--font-sans); display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; }
   401→                .post-nav-link.next .post-nav-label { justify-content: flex-end; }
   402→                .post-nav-title { font-family: var(--font-serif); font-style: italic; font-size: 16px; color: var(--color-text-primary); line-height: 1.3; transition: color var(--transition-fast); }
   403→                .post-nav-link:hover .post-nav-title { color: var(--color-accent); }
   404→
   405→                /* Mobile menu */
   406→                .mobile-menu { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; background: var(--color-background); z-index: 99; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; padding: 0 24px; opacity: 0; pointer-events: none; transition: opacity 0.3s ease; }
   407→                .mobile-menu.open { opacity: 1; pointer-events: auto; }
   408→                .mobile-menu-link { color: var(--color-text-primary); text-decoration: none; font-family: var(--font-serif); font-size: 32px; font-style: italic; padding: 16px 0; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border); transition: color var(--transition-fast); }
   409→                .mobile-menu-link:hover { color: var(--color-accent); }
   410→
   411→                /* Mobile TOC */
   412→                .toc-mobile { margin-bottom: 32px; }
   413→                .toc-toggle { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; width: 100%; padding: 16px; background: var(--color-background-secondary); border: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); color: var(--color-text-primary); font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; cursor: pointer; font-family: var(--font-sans); transition: all var(--transition-fast); }
   414→                .toc-toggle:hover { background: var(--color-background-tertiary); }
   415→                .toc-toggle svg { width: 16px; height: 16px; transition: transform var(--transition-fast); color: var(--color-text-muted); }
   416→                .toc-toggle.open svg { transform: rotate(180deg); }
   417→                .toc-mobile-content { padding: 16px; background: var(--color-background-secondary); border: 1px solid var(--color-border-light); border-top: none; display: none; }
   418→                .toc-mobile-content.open { display: block; }
   419→                .toc-mobile-content .toc-item { display: block; text-align: left; width: 100%; background: transparent; border: none; }
   420→
   421→                /* Desktop TOC sidebar */
   422→                .toc-sidebar { position: fixed; top: 120px; right: max(24px, calc((100vw - 1200px) / 2 - 200px)); width: 200px; display: none; }
   423→                @media (min-width: 1280px) { .toc-sidebar { display: block; } }
   424→
   425→                /* Anchor links on headings */
   426→                .heading-anchor { opacity: 0; margin-left: 8px; color: var(--color-text-muted); text-decoration: none; transition: opacity var(--transition-fast); }
   427→                .blog-prose h2:hover .heading-anchor, .blog-prose h3:hover .heading-anchor { opacity: 1; }
   428→                .heading-anchor:hover { color: var(--color-accent); }
   429→
   430→                /* Image blur-up */
   431→                .hero-image { transition: opacity 0.5s ease, filter 0.5s ease; }
   432→                .hero-image.loading { filter: blur(10px); opacity: 0.6; }
   433→                .hero-image.loaded { filter: blur(0); opacity: 0.85; }
   434→
   435→                /* Print styles */
   436→                @media print {
   437→                    .progress-bar, .blog-nav, .back-to-top, .copy-toast, .toc-sidebar, .toc-mobile, .post-nav, .more-thoughts, .author-card-actions, .action-btn, .like-btn, .mobile-menu { display: none !important; }
   438→                    .blog-prose { max-width: 100% !important; }
   439→                    .blog-prose a { color: inherit; text-decoration: underline; }
   440→                    .blog-prose a::after { content: " (" attr(href) ")"; font-size: 0.8em; color: #666; }
   441→                    .code-block { break-inside: avoid; box-shadow: none; border: 1px solid #ccc; }
   442→                    .author-card { break-inside: avoid; }
   443→                    body { font-size: 12pt; line-height: 1.5; }
   444→                    h1 { font-size: 24pt; }
   445→                    h2 { font-size: 18pt; }

   794→                    {/* Content */}
   795→                    <div ref={contentRef} className="blog-prose" style={{ marginTop: post.thumbnail ? '0' : '48px' }}>
   796→                        <ReactMarkdown
   797→                            remarkPlugins={[remarkGfm]}
   798→                            components={{
   799→                                h2({ children, ...props }) {
   800→                                    const text = String(children);
   801→                                    const id = text.toLowerCase().replace(/[^\w\s-]/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '-');
   802→                                    return (
   803→                                        <h2 id={id} {...props}>
   804→                                            {children}
   805→                                            <a href={`#${id}`} className="heading-anchor" aria-label={`Link to ${text}`}>#</a>
   806→                                        </h2>
   807→                                    );
   808→                                },
   809→                                h3({ children, ...props }) {
   810→                                    const text = String(children);
   811→                                    const id = text.toLowerCase().replace(/[^\w\s-]/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '-');
   812→                                    return (
   813→                                        <h3 id={id} {...props}>
   814→                                            {children}
   815→                                            <a href={`#${id}`} className="heading-anchor" aria-label={`Link to ${text}`}>#</a>
   816→                                        </h3>
   817→                                    );
   818→                                },
   819→                                code({ className, children, ...props }) {
   820→                                    const match = /language-(\w+)/.exec(className || '');
   821→                                    const isInline = !match;
   822→                                    const code = String(children).replace(/\n$/, '');
   823→                                    const lang = match ? match[1] : 'text';
   824→                                    const filename = lang === 'solidity' ? 'Contract.sol' : lang === 'json' ? 'config.json' : lang === 'typescript' ? 'index.ts' : `code.${lang}`;
   825→
   826→                                    return !isInline ? (
   827→                                        <div className="code-block">
   828→                                            <div className="code-header">
   829→                                                <div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' }}>
   830→                                                    <div className="code-dots">
   831→                                                        <div className="code-dot code-dot-red" />
   832→                                                        <div className="code-dot code-dot-yellow" />
   833→                                                        <div className="code-dot code-dot-green" />
   834→                                                    </div>
   835→                                                    <span className="code-filename">{filename}</span>
   836→                                                </div>
   837→                                                <div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '12px' }}>
   838→                                                    <span className="code-lang">{lang}</span>
   839→                                                    <button className="code-copy-btn" onClick={() => copyCode(code)}>
   840→                                                        {copiedCode === code ? (
   841→                                                            <><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="2"><polyline points="20,6 9,17 4,12"/></svg> Copied</>
   842→                                                        ) : (
   843→                                                            <><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="2"><rect x="9" y="9" width="13" height="13" rx="2"/><path d="M5 15H4a2 2 0 0 1-2-2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h9a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v1"/></svg> Copy</>
   844→                                                        )}
   845→                                                    </button>
   846→                                                </div>
   847→                                            </div>
   848→                                            <div className="code-content">
   849→                                                <SyntaxHighlighter
   850→                                                    style={isDark ? oneDark : oneLight}
   851→                                                    language={lang}
   852→                                                    PreTag="div"
   853→                                                    customStyle={{ margin: 0, padding: 0, background: 'transparent', fontSize: '14px', lineHeight: '1.6', fontFamily: 'ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, "SF Mono", Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, monospace' }}
   854→                                                >
   855→                                                    {code}
   856→                                                </SyntaxHighlighter>
   857→                                            </div>
   858→                                        </div>
   859→                                    ) : (
   860→                                        <code className={className} {...props}>{children}</code>
   861→                                    );
   862→                                }
   863→                            }}
   864→                        >

   891→                                                <path d="M5 15H4a2 2 0 0 1-2-2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h9a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v1" />
   892→                                            </>
   893→                                        )}
   894→                                    </svg>
   895→                                    {emailCopied ? 'Copied!' : 'Copy Email'}
   896→                                </button>
   897→                                <div className="author-card-divider" />
   898→                                <a href="/dmitrii-fotesco-resume.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" className="author-card-btn">
   899→                                    <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="2" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round">
   900→                                        <path d="M21 15v4a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H5a2 2 0 0 1-2-2v-4" />
   901→                                        <polyline points="7 10 12 15 17 10" />
   902→                                        <line x1="12" y1="15" x2="12" y2="3" />
   903→                                    </svg>
   904→                                    Resume

     5→// Parse markdown links [text](url) into clickable anchors
     6→function parseLinks(text: string): React.ReactNode {
     7→  const parts: React.ReactNode[] = [];
     8→  let lastIndex = 0;
     9→
    10→  // Use matchAll to avoid global regex state issues
    11→  for (const match of text.matchAll(/\[([^\]]+)\]\(([^)]+)\)/g)) {
    12→    // Add text before the link
    13→    if (match.index! > lastIndex) {
    14→      parts.push(text.slice(lastIndex, match.index));
    15→    }
    16→    // Add the link
    17→    parts.push(
    18→      <a
    19→        key={match.index}
    20→        href={match[2]}
    21→        target="_blank"
    22→        rel="noopener noreferrer"
    23→        style={{
    24→          color: 'var(--color-accent)',
    25→          textDecoration: 'underline',
    26→          textDecorationColor: 'var(--color-accent)',
    27→          textUnderlineOffset: '2px'
    28→        }}
    29→        onMouseEnter={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.borderBottomColor = 'var(--color-accent)'}
    30→        onMouseLeave={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.borderBottomColor = 'transparent'}
    31→      >
    32→        {match[1]}
    33→      </a>
    34→    );
    35→    lastIndex = match.index! + match[0].length;
    36→  }
    37→
    38→  // Add remaining text
    39→  if (lastIndex < text.length) {
    40→    parts.push(text.slice(lastIndex));
    41→  }
    42→
    43→  return parts.length > 0 ? parts : text;
    44→}

     1→import { useState } from 'react';

     5→import { WORDS_PER_MINUTE, NEW_POST_THRESHOLD_DAYS } from '../lib/constants';
     6→
     7→// Auto-discover blog posts using import.meta.glob
     8→const blogPostFiles = import.meta.glob('../../content/blog/*.md', { query: '?raw', eager: true });
     9→
    10→interface BlogProps {
    11→    isMobile: boolean;
    12→    isTablet: boolean;
    13→}
    14→
    15→// Calculate reading time
    16→function calculateReadingTime(content: string): number {
    17→    const words = content.split(/\s+/).length;
    18→    return Math.ceil(words / WORDS_PER_MINUTE);
    19→}
    20→
    21→// Extract slug from filename (YYYY-MM-DD-slug.md → slug)
    22→function extractSlugFromFilename(path: string): string {
    23→    const filename = path.split('/').pop() || '';
    24→    // Remove .md extension and date prefix (YYYY-MM-DD-)
    25→    return filename.replace(/^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}-/, '').replace(/\.md$/, '');
    26→}
    27→
    28→// Parse all blog posts (auto-discovered)
    29→function parseBlogPosts(): BlogPost[] {
    30→    const posts = Object.entries(blogPostFiles).map(([path, module]) => {
    31→        const raw = (module as any).default as string;
    32→        const slug = extractSlugFromFilename(path);
    33→        const { frontmatter, content } = parseFrontmatter(raw);
    34→
    35→        return {
    36→            slug,
    37→            title: frontmatter.title as string || 'Untitled',
    38→            date: frontmatter.date as string || new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
    39→            excerpt: frontmatter.excerpt as string || '',
    40→            tags: (frontmatter.tags as string[]) || [],
    41→            thumbnail: frontmatter.thumbnail as string | null || null,
    42→            readingTime: calculateReadingTime(content),
    43→            content
    44→        };
    45→    });
    46→
    47→    return posts.sort((a, b) => new Date(b.date).getTime() - new Date(a.date).getTime());
    48→}
    49→
    50→// Check if post is new (within threshold days)

    55→    return diffDays <= NEW_POST_THRESHOLD_DAYS;
    56→}

    15→// Calculate reading time

    17→    const words = content.split(/\s+/).length;
    18→    return Math.ceil(words / WORDS_PER_MINUTE);
    19→}
    20→
    21→// Extract slug from filename (YYYY-MM-DD-slug.md → slug)
    22→function extractSlugFromFilename(path: string): string {
    23→    const filename = path.split('/').pop() || '';
    24→    // Remove .md extension and date prefix (YYYY-MM-DD-)
    25→    return filename.replace(/^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}-/, '').replace(/\.md$/, '');
    26→}
    27→
    28→// Parse all blog posts (auto-discovered)
    29→function parseBlogPosts(): BlogPost[] {
    30→    const posts = Object.entries(blogPostFiles).map(([path, module]) => {
    31→        const raw = (module as any).default as string;
    32→        const slug = extractSlugFromFilename(path);
    33→        const { frontmatter, content } = parseFrontmatter(raw);
    34→
    35→        return {
    36→            slug,
    37→            title: frontmatter.title as string || 'Untitled',

    39→            excerpt: frontmatter.excerpt as string || '',

    45→    });

     7→// Parse {{accent}}...{{/accent}} markers in text
     8→function parseStyledText(text: string): ReactNode[] {
     9→  const parts: ReactNode[] = [];
    10→  let lastIndex = 0;
    11→
    12→  // Use matchAll to avoid global regex state issues
    13→  for (const match of text.matchAll(/\{\{accent\}\}(.*?)\{\{\/accent\}\}/g)) {
    14→    // Add text before the match
    15→    if (match.index! > lastIndex) {
    16→      parts.push(text.slice(lastIndex, match.index));
    17→    }
    18→    // Add styled text
    19→    parts.push(
    20→      <span key={match.index} style={{
    21→        color: 'var(--color-accent)',
    22→        fontFamily: 'var(--font-serif)',
    23→        fontStyle: 'italic',
    24→        fontWeight: 600,
    25→        fontSize: '1.2em'
    26→      }}>
    27→        {match[1]}
    28→      </span>
    29→    );
    30→    lastIndex = match.index! + match[0].length;
    31→  }
    32→
    33→  // Add remaining text
    34→  if (lastIndex < text.length) {
    35→    parts.push(text.slice(lastIndex));
    36→  }
    37→
    38→  return parts.length > 0 ? parts : [text];
    39→}

## Image Handling Analysis Report

### 1. Current IMG Tag Usage Patterns

The portfolio uses **raw HTML `<img>` tags** throughout components with minimal optimization:

**Primary Patterns Found:**

- **AboutSection**: Profile headshot (140-280px width, aspect ratio 3/4)
  ```tsx
  <img src={photo} alt={name} loading="lazy" decoding="async" />
  ```

- **CaseStudiesSection**: Case study thumbnails
  ```tsx
  <img src={study.hook.thumbnail} alt={...} objectFit="cover" />
  ```

- **BlogPostPage**: 
  - Author avatar (48px and 64px)
  - Hero image with blur-up effect (16/9 aspect ratio)
  ```tsx
  <img src={post.thumbnail} className="hero-image" loading="lazy" onLoad={() => setImageLoaded(true)} />
  ```

- **BlogPostModal**: Similar blog post rendering

**Key Observations:**
- Only AboutSection uses `loading="lazy"` and `decoding="async"`
- Author avatars have fallback to placeholder on error
- No `srcSet` or responsive image variants
- No WebP support or format negotiation
- Each component manages its own image state independently

---

### 2. Existing Image Optimization & Lazy Loading

**Current Optimizations:**
- `loading="lazy"` on profile photo and blog hero images
- `decoding="async"` on profile photo
- `object-fit: cover` for consistent aspect ratios
- Blur-up effect in blog hero (CSS-based filtering)
- Error handling with fallback placeholders (URL-based, not ideal)

**Missing Optimizations:**
- No responsive image serving (same resolution for all devices)
- No WebP/AVIF format support
- No image compression at build time
- No placeholder/skeleton loading (blur-up is visual only)
- No intersection observer for true lazy loading
- No CDN integration or image resizing service
- File sizes range from 55KB-661KB with no optimization
  - headshot.jpg: 55KB
  - og-image.png: 220KB
  - case-study PNGs: 269-422KB
  - mempools.png: 661KB

---

### 3. Where Images Are Used

**Profile Section:**
- `/images/headshot.jpg` - About section profile photo (aspect 3/4)
- `/images/og-image.png` & `/images/og-image-light.png` - OG meta tags

**Case Studies:**
- `/images/case-study-*.png` - Thumbnails in CaseStudiesSection (4 images, 269-422KB each)
- Cases visible in drawer/modal view

**Blog:**
- `frontmatter.thumbnail` - Blog post hero images (16/9 aspect ratio)
- Dynamic markdown image rendering (no custom img component)

**Company Logos:**
- `/images/logos/*.{svg,ico,png}` - Logo directory (14 logo variants)
  - Used in CertificationsSection and ExperienceSection (likely)

**Resume/Media:**
- `/images/dmitrii-resume.pdf` - PDF file

**Landing Page:**
- OG images in Helmet meta tags for social sharing

---

### 4. Image Paths & Public Directory Structure

```
public/images/
├── headshot.jpg (55KB) - Profile photo
├── mempools.png (661KB) - Large product image
├── case-study-*.png (4 files, 269-422KB each)
├── og-image.png (220KB) - Dark theme OG
├── og-image-light.png (109KB) - Light theme OG
├── dmitrii-resume.pdf (74KB)
└── logos/
    ├── *.svg files - Vector logos (preferred)
    ├── *.png files - Raster fallbacks (6 images)
    ├── *.ico files - Favicon formats (4 files)
    └── mempools.svg - Company logo
```

**Usage Pattern:**
- Images served directly from `public/images/`
- No build-time optimization
- All paths hardcoded as strings in components
- No centralized image configuration

---

### 5. Performance Concerns

**Critical Issues:**
1. **No responsive variants** - Same image served to mobile (375px) and desktop (1920px)
2. **Large PNG case studies** - 269-422KB each uncompressed
3. **No format negotiation** - Missing WebP/AVIF for modern browsers
4. **No dynamic sizing** - Images don't adapt to viewport
5. **Placeholder fallbacks** - Using external placeholder service instead of local
6. **No caching strategy** - No Cache-Control headers visible
7. **Author avatar duplication** - Same image loaded multiple times with different sizes
8. **No blur-up placeholder** - Blog images have CSS blur but not lightweight placeholder

**Secondary Issues:**
1. Markdown images from blog posts have no optimization (via ReactMarkdown)
2. No image preloading for critical images (hero, OG images)
3. No loading states except CSS blur effect
4. Error handling uses external URL instead of inline SVG/CSS

---

### Recommended Optimized Image Component

An optimized Image component should provide:

```typescript
interface OptimizedImageProps {
  // Basic
  src: string;
  alt: string;
  
  // Responsiveness
  width?: number | string;
  height?: number | string;
  aspectRatio?: 'square' | '3/4' | '4/3' | '16/9' | string;
  
  // Sizes for responsive loading
  sizes?: string; // e.g., "(max-width: 768px) 100vw, 50vw"
  srcSet?: Record<number, string>; // e.g., { 400: 'img-400.webp', 800: 'img-800.webp' }
  
  // Optimization
  format?: 'webp' | 'avif' | 'jpeg' | 'png' | 'auto'; // auto = detect + fallback
  quality?: number; // 0-100, default 80
  
  // Loading behavior
  loading?: 'lazy' | 'eager' | 'auto';
  decoding?: 'async' | 'sync' | 'auto';
  placeholder?: 'blur' | 'empty' | 'dataurl'; // LQIP strategies
  
  // Fallback & error handling
  fallback?: React.ReactNode; // component or string
  onError?: () => void;
  
  // Styling
  fill?: boolean; // absolute fill container
  cover?: boolean; // object-fit: cover
  contain?: boolean; // object-fit: contain
  className?: string;
  style?: React.CSSProperties;
  
  // Metadata
  priority?: boolean; // adds preload + fetchPriority
  title?: string;
}
```

**Features to Implement:**

1. **Format Negotiation**
   - Serve WebP to modern browsers, JPEG/PNG fallback
   - AVIF as premium format for latest browsers
   - Automatic format detection via Accept header or UA parsing

2. **Responsive Images**
   - Generate srcSet variants at build time (400px, 800px, 1200px, 1600px)
   - Mobile-first sizing: `(max-width: 640px) 100vw, (max-width: 1024px) 50vw, 33vw`
   - Separate breakpoints for different image types (hero vs thumbnail)

3. **Lazy Loading**
   - Intersection Observer for true lazy loading
   - Native `loading="lazy"` fallback
   - Threshold-based loading (load before entering viewport)

4. **Placeholder Strategies**
   - Blur-up: Ultra-low quality version (10-30KB) shown during load
   - Data URL: Inline base64 mini-image
   - CSS skeleton: Simple background gradient
   - Empty: Nothing until load

5. **Image Optimization at Build**
   - Sharp plugin for Vite to auto-generate variants
   - AVIF, WebP, JPEG/PNG formats
   - Metadata extraction (dimensions, aspect ratio)
   - Automatic srcSet generation

6. **Performance Features**
   - Priority images get `<link rel="preload">` + `fetchPriority="high"`
   - Preconnect to CDN if used
   - Cache busting with content hash
   - Error boundary with graceful fallback

7. **Analytics Integration**
   - Track loading performance (LCP, image load time)
   - Log failed image loads
   - Monitor format usage (WebP adoption rate)

8. **Use Cases in Portfolio**
   - **Profile photo**: priority, blur-up, cover
   - **Case study thumbnails**: lazy, responsive, aspect 4/3 or auto
   - **Blog hero**: priority, blur-up, 16/9 aspect, fullwidth
   - **Company logos**: lazy, contain, no optimization (already SVG)
   - **OG images**: preload + fetchPriority for social sharing

---

### Implementation Strategy

**Phase 1: Create Base Component**
- `/src/components/common/Image.tsx` - Core component
- Implement format negotiation and srcSet generation
- Add error boundary and fallback UI

**Phase 2: Build Integration**
- Create Vite plugin or use existing sharp plugin
- Generate image variants during build
- Output metadata JSON for component consumption

**Phase 3: Migration**
- Convert critical images first (profile, hero, OG)
- Update AboutSection, BlogPostPage, CaseStudiesSection
- Add priority props to above-fold images

**Phase 4: Markdown Images**
- Create custom ReactMarkdown image component
- Auto-apply optimization to all inline blog images
- Generate variants for markdown image srcSet

**Phase 5: Monitoring**
- Add performance metrics tracking
- Monitor Core Web Vitals (LCP, CLS, FID)
- Track image load failures and format adoption

---

### Summary

**Current State:** Basic, unoptimized image handling with minimal lazy loading and no responsive variants.

**Key Gaps:** No format negotiation, no build-time optimization, no adaptive image serving, inconsistent error handling.

**Impact:** Potentially 50-70% larger downloads on mobile, slower LCP scores, missed performance optimization opportunities.

**Priority:** High - Images represent significant portion of bundle size, and optimization has direct SEO/UX impact.

### Implementation

#### 2.1: Install Vite Image Tools

\```

#### 2.2: Configure Vite Plugin
\```typescript
// vite.config.ts
import { imagetools } from 'vite-imagetools';

export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    imagetools({
      defaultDirectives: new URLSearchParams({
        format: 'webp;avif;jpg',
        w: '320;640;1024;1920',
        quality: '80'
      })
    })
  ]
});
\```

#### 2.3: Create OptimizedImage Component
\```typescript
// src/components/ui/OptimizedImage.tsx
interface OptimizedImageProps {
  src: string;
  alt: string;
  sizes?: string;
  className?: string;
  priority?: boolean; // Skip lazy loading for above-fold
  aspectRatio?: string;
}
\```

Features:
- srcSet with multiple widths (320, 640, 1024, 1920)
- WebP/AVIF with JPG fallback via `<picture>`
- Blur placeholder (base64 tiny image)

/**
 * OptimizedImage Component
 *
 * Wrapper for responsive images with:
 * - Native lazy loading
 * - Aspect ratio preservation (prevents CLS)
 * - Blur placeholder effect
 * - Accessibility attributes
 *
 * For full srcSet/WebP optimization, import images with vite-imagetools:
 * import heroWebp from '../assets/hero.jpg?w=640;1024;1920&format=webp&as=srcset'
 * import heroFallback from '../assets/hero.jpg?w=1024'
 *
 * Then use with <picture> element for format fallback.
 */

import { useState, useRef, useEffect, CSSProperties } from 'react';

interface OptimizedImageProps {
  src: string;
  alt: string;
  width?: number;
  height?: number;
  sizes?: string;
  srcSet?: string;
  className?: string;
  style?: CSSProperties;
  priority?: boolean; // Skip lazy loading for above-fold images
  aspectRatio?: string; // e.g., "16/9", "4/3", "1/1"
  objectFit?: 'cover' | 'contain' | 'fill' | 'none';
  placeholder?: 'blur' | 'none';
  blurDataURL?: string; // Base64 tiny image for blur placeholder
}

export function OptimizedImage({
  src,
  alt,
  width,
  height,
  sizes = '100vw',
  srcSet,
  className = '',
  style = {},
  priority = false,
  aspectRatio,
  objectFit = 'cover',
  placeholder = 'none',
  blurDataURL,
}: OptimizedImageProps) {
  const [isLoaded, setIsLoaded] = useState(false);
  const [isInView, setIsInView] = useState(priority);
  const imgRef = useRef<HTMLImageElement>(null);

  // Intersection observer for lazy loading trigger
  useEffect(() => {
    if (priority || !imgRef.current) return;

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            setIsInView(true);
            observer.disconnect();
          }
        });
      },
      { rootMargin: '50px' } // Start loading slightly before visible
    );

    observer.observe(imgRef.current);
    return () => observer.disconnect();
  }, [priority]);

  const containerStyle: CSSProperties = {
    position: 'relative',
    overflow: 'hidden',
    ...(aspectRatio && { aspectRatio }),
    ...style,
  };

  const imgStyle: CSSProperties = {
    display: 'block',
    width: '100%',
    height: '100%',
    objectFit,
    transition: 'opacity 0.3s ease-in-out',
    opacity: placeholder === 'blur' && !isLoaded ? 0 : 1,
  };

  const placeholderStyle: CSSProperties = {
    position: 'absolute',
    inset: 0,
    backgroundImage: blurDataURL ? `url(${blurDataURL})` : undefined,
    backgroundSize: 'cover',
    backgroundPosition: 'center',
    filter: 'blur(20px)',
    transform: 'scale(1.1)', // Prevent blur edge artifacts
    opacity: isLoaded ? 0 : 1,
    transition: 'opacity 0.3s ease-in-out',
  };

  return (
    <div className={className} style={containerStyle}>
      {/* Blur placeholder */}
      {placeholder === 'blur' && blurDataURL && (
        <div style={placeholderStyle} aria-hidden="true" />
      )}

      {/* Main image */}
      <img
        ref={imgRef}
        src={isInView ? src : undefined}
        srcSet={isInView ? srcSet : undefined}
        sizes={sizes}
        alt={alt}
        width={width}
        height={height}
        loading={priority ? 'eager' : 'lazy'}
        decoding={priority ? 'sync' : 'async'}
        onLoad={() => setIsLoaded(true)}
        style={imgStyle}
      />
    </div>
  );
}

/**
 * Picture component for format fallbacks (WebP/AVIF with JPG fallback)
 *
 * Usage:
 * <OptimizedPicture
 *   sources={[
 *     { srcSet: avifSrcSet, type: 'image/avif' },
 *     { srcSet: webpSrcSet, type: 'image/webp' },
 *   ]}
 *   src={fallbackJpg}
 *   alt="Description"
 * />
 */
interface PictureSource {
  srcSet: string;
  type: 'image/avif' | 'image/webp' | 'image/jpeg' | 'image/png';
  sizes?: string;
}

interface OptimizedPictureProps extends Omit<OptimizedImageProps, 'srcSet'> {
  sources: PictureSource[];
}

export function OptimizedPicture({
  sources,
  src,
  alt,
  sizes = '100vw',
  className = '',
  style = {},
  priority = false,
  aspectRatio,
  objectFit = 'cover',
  width,
  height,
}: OptimizedPictureProps) {
  const [isLoaded, setIsLoaded] = useState(false);

  const containerStyle: CSSProperties = {
    position: 'relative',
    overflow: 'hidden',
    ...(aspectRatio && { aspectRatio }),
    ...style,
  };

  const imgStyle: CSSProperties = {
    display: 'block',
    width: '100%',
    height: '100%',
    objectFit,
  };

  return (
    <picture className={className} style={containerStyle}>
      {sources.map((source, index) => (
        <source
          key={index}
          srcSet={source.srcSet}
          type={source.type}
          sizes={source.sizes || sizes}
        />
      ))}
      <img
        src={src}
        alt={alt}
        width={width}
        height={height}
        loading={priority ? 'eager' : 'lazy'}
        decoding={priority ? 'sync' : 'async'}
        onLoad={() => setIsLoaded(true)}
        style={imgStyle}
      />
    </picture>
  );
}

export default OptimizedImage;

     8→function parseStyledText(text: string): ReactNode[] {

    13→  for (const match of text.matchAll(/\{\{accent\}\}(.*?)\{\{\/accent\}\}/g)) {

    35→    parts.push(text.slice(lastIndex));
    36→  }
    37→
